response.original_title: McGee and Me!: Take Me Out of the Ball Game
response.overview: Nick and his friends play for the underdog Eastfield Braves, who are up against the rival Dodgers in a crucial Little League championship game. Nick and his father, who is also the team's coach, put all their hopes on the Braves' star player, Thurman Miller, idolizing him and believing he alone can secure their victory
response.title: McGee and Me!: Take Me Out of the Ball Game
